
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

public class Main {

	public static int edit(int a[], int b[], int i, int j, int count) {

		if (i == a.length)
			return count + b.length - j;

		if (j == b.length)
			return count + a.length - i;

		if (a[i] == b[j])
			return edit(a, b, i + 1, j + 1, count);

		int insert = edit(a, b, i, j + 1, count + 1);
		int delete = edit(a, b, i + 1, j, count + 1);
		int substitute = edit(a, b, i + 1, j + 1, count + 1);

		return Math.min(substitute, Math.min(insert, delete));
	}

	public static void dp2(int a[], int b[]) {

		int m = a.length;
		int n = b.length;

		int dp[][] = new int[n + 1][m + 1];

		for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
			dp[0][i] = i;

		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
			dp[i][0] = i;

		for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {

				if (a[j - 1] == b[i - 1])
					dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1];
				else
					dp[i][j] = Math.min(Math.min(dp[i - 1][j], dp[i][j - 1]),
							dp[i - 1][j - 1]) + 1;
			}
		}

		System.out.println(dp[n][m]);
	}

	public static void main(String args[]) throws NumberFormatException,
			IOException {

		BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		int T = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());

		for (int i = 0; i < T; i++) {
			int m = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
			int a[] = new int[m];

			String s[] = br.readLine().split(" ");
			for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
				a[j] = Integer.parseInt(s[j]);

			int n = Integer.parseInt(br.readLine());
			int b[] = new int[n];

			s = br.readLine().split(" ");
			for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
				b[j] = Integer.parseInt(s[j]);

			dp2(a, b);
		}
	}
}
